tool_description: Constructs detailed event timelines with photography milestones, coordinating with venue schedules and vendor requirements.

key_moments.description: List of key moments to photograph

buffer_time_minutes.description: Buffer time between key moments in minutes

error_messages: Invalid time range: Event start time must be before end time
Empty key moments: Provide at least one key moment to photograph
Invalid prep time: Preparation time must be between 0.5 and 8 hours
Invalid buffer time: Buffer time must be between 5 and 60 minutes
usage: Provide event_date, event_start_time, event_end_time, and key_moments array. Optionally specify venue_restrictions, prep_time_hours, and buffer_time_minutes.

scheduled_moments.description: Chronologically ordered list of photography moments with timestamps

total_coverage_hours.description: Total hours of photography coverage required
